analysis.description:
GameCell.canSubAllocation (/unique_contracts/0x8bcb64bfda77905398b67af0af084c744e777a20.sol#510-534) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- allocations[sender][j].releaseTime >= block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0x8bcb64bfda77905398b67af0af084c744e777a20.sol#527-530)

GameCell.subAllocation (/unique_contracts/0x8bcb64bfda77905398b67af0af084c744e777a20.sol#534-564) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- allocations[sender][j].releaseTime < block.timestamp (/unique_contracts/0x8bcb64bfda77905398b67af0af084c744e777a20.sol#543-554)
